Articles.Content:
So I started a fresh save recently and have been working on a new mun base and thought I would post a picture of how its coming together.

At this point I have

-Living quarters for 16 Kerbols, although we only have five kerbonauts on base atm With Bob as mission commander.

-A small three man shuttle in case the need arises to get off the mun in a hurry.

-A large fuel tanker driven by Jeb.

-There was a skycrane but it lost two of its four nuclear engines landing the rover a replacement is on its way from Kerbin however

A picture of the mission team goofing off till the new crane gets there with the first Kethane mining rig.

http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb249/Sheaperd/2013-05-22_00002_zps8e90df26.jpg' alt='2013-05-22_00002_zps8e90df26.jpg'>

...we only have five kerbonauts on base atm With Bob as mission commander...A small three man shuttle in case the need arises to get off the mun in a hurry...

I think two of your Kerbals won't be happy if that need arises...
Yeah the other two were supposed to take the two man skycrane until the rover broke that XD.
